detail_desc: Sports trousers in fast-drying functional fabric with elastication and a concealed drawstring at the waist and zipped side pockets. Reflective details and tapered legs with a zip at the hems.
Short, gently fitted dress in a viscose weave with a V-neck and buttons down the front. Short, elasticated puff sleeves. Unlined.
Jumper in a soft, fine cotton knit with long raglan sleeves and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Tops in stretch jersey made from a cotton blend with a V-neck and long sleeves. Slim fit.

Knee-length dress in a viscose crêpe weave with a V-neck, buttons down the front and long sleeves with gathers at the shoulders. Seam under the bust with elastication at the back and a gently flared skirt. Unlined.
Jacket in sweatshirt fabric with a hood, zip down the front, front pockets and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside.
Flared skirt in glittery tulle. Shimmering elastic waistband with a sewn-on bow. Lined.

Trousers in woven fabric with covered elastication and a drawstring at the waist, a zip fly and a hook-and-eye fastening, side pockets and a welt back pocket. Relaxed Fit – a fit with good room for movement creating a comfortable, relaxed silhouette.
Waistcoat in twill with buttons down the front and welt front pockets. Lined.

Calf-length dress in a jacquard weave made from a Tencel™ lyocell blend with a collar, buttons down the front and yoke with a pleat at the back. Dropped shoulders, long sleeves with buttoned cuffs, and slits in the sides. Slightly longer at the back. Unlined.
Slim-fit pull-on jeans in washed denim with ribbing and a drawstring at the waist and a fake fly with a press-stud. Side pockets, a coin pocket, back pockets and slim legs.

Shirt in marled cotton twill with a brushed finish. Collar, classic front, a chest pocket and yoke at the back. Long sleeves with adjustable buttoning at the cuffs, and a rounded hem. Longer at the back.
Fitted top in soft pima cotton jersey with a wrapover boat neck and long sleeves.

Oxford cotton shirt with a button-down collar, classic front and open chest pocket. Long sleeves with adjustable buttoning at the cuffs, a yoke with a pleat and hanger at the back and a rounded hem. Slightly longer at the back. Regular fit – a classic fit with good room for movement and a gently shaped waist to create a comfortable, tailored silhouette.

All-in-one suit in soft, printed sweatshirt fabric with a jersey-lined hood, zip down the front and pockets in the side seams. Long sleeves with ribbed cuffs and long legs with ribbed hems. Soft brushed inside.
Short dress in soft jersey made from a viscose blend with a round neckline, long sleeves and side pockets. Unlined.
Satin cami top with a lace trim, narrow adjustable shoulder straps and gentle draping at the top.
T-shirt in soft jersey with a slightly wider, raw-edge neckline, seam centre back and short, raw-edged sleeves. Slightly longer and rounded at the back.
Sandals in imitation leather with a decorative appliqué on the front, an ankle strap with a hook and loop tab, and a loop at the back. Imitation leather insoles and rubber soles.

Sandals in imitation leather with a lightly padded top edge and an ankle strap with a hook and loop fastening. Wide strap over the foot with shimmering appliqués and an adjustable hook and loop fastening. Imitation leather linings and insoles and patterned soles.
Sleeveless top in soft jersey made from a modal and cotton blend with a V-neck front and back. Flounce woven in a cotton blend with broderie anglaise around the neckline.
Jumper in a soft rib knit containing some wool with dropped shoulders, long sleeves and roll edges around the neckline, cuffs and hem.

Joggers in soft sweatshirt fabric made from a cotton blend with covered elastication and a drawstring at the waist, diagonal side pockets and a small print motif at the top. Side stripes, contrasting colour panels at the knees and covered elastication at the hems. Soft brushed inside.
Short, fitted dress in sturdy, patterned jersey with short sleeves and ribbing around the neckline.
Long-sleeved top in soft fabric with narrow ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Short jersey top in a cotton blend with a small jersey stand-up collar, yoke at the top, zip with a pendant at the back and long mesh sleeves.

STUDIO COLLECTION. Duffle coat in scuba fabric with a felted, wool-blend finish. Hood with a detachable storm flap. Buttons, wind flap and concealed zip down the front. Flap front pockets with press-studs.
5-pocket jeans in washed stretch denim with a regular waist, zip fly and button, and skinny legs.

Cropped top in woven fabric containing some linen with a silicone trim at the top, knot detail at the front and concealed zip at the back. One wide, flounce-trimmed, elasticated shoulder strap and one narrow, detachable, adjustable shoulder strap. Lined.
Jumper in fine-knit slub cotton with long raglan sleeves and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Slip-on trainers with elastic gores in the sides and a loop at the back. Imitation cork insoles and textured rubber soles.
Top in printed sweatshirt fabric with dropped shoulders, long sleeves, a lined hood with a decorative drawstring, and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside.
Jersey top with a round neckline, 3/4-length sleeves and a rounded hem with slits in the sides. Slightly longer at the back.
Long coat in woven fabric with narrow notch lapels and no buttons at the front. Long sleeves with sewn-in turn-ups, discreet front pockets and a single back vent. Tape-trimmed inner seams. Unlined.

Sleeveless jumpsuit in a patterned cotton weave with a gentle V-neck, wide shoulder straps and ties at the back. Elasticated seam at the waist, open section at the back, side pockets and straight, wide legs.
Jacket in soft sweatshirt fabric with a zip down the front and a jersey-lined hood with appliqués around the edge. Welt side pockets and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside.
Short, sleeveless top in viscose jersey with a deep, rib-trimmed neckline, ribbing around the armholes and an overlocked hem with ties at the front.
Slim-fit trousers in soft, superstretch twill for maximum mobility. Adjustable elasticated waist (in sizes 8-12Y), a zip fly and button, fake front pockets, real back pockets and straight hems.
Twill cap with an appliqué on the front and an adjustable plastic fastener at the back.
Jumper in a soft fine knit containing some wool with long sleeves and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
5-pocket jeans in washed stretch denim with hard-worn details in a relaxed fit over the hips and thighs and skinny fit over the calves. Regular waist and button fly.
Thong briefs in lace with a low waist, lined gusset, narrow sides and string back.
Cardigan in soft, fine-knit cotton with long sleeves, buttons down the front and narrow ribbing at the cuffs and hem.
Thong briefs in microfibre with a low waist, lined gusset and string back. The polyamide content of the briefs is recycled.
Shorter-style blouse in a patterned viscose weave with a deep V-neck, buttons down the front, dropped shoulders and long sleeves with buttoned cuffs. Longer and rounded at the back.
Imitation suede mules with a square front and low heels. Fabric linings, imitation leather insoles and rubber soles. Heel 3 cm.
Top in soft cotton jersey with a boat neck and deep opening at the back with ties. Gathered seam under the bust to create soft draping.
Round-necked T-shirt in soft jersey.
Short, double-breasted coat in felted fabric with a collar, decorative pocket flaps at the front, seam under the bust and single back vent. Lined.
Fishnet tights with an elasticated waist.
Derby shoes in imitation leather with open lacing at the front. Canvas linings and insoles and thermoplastic rubber (TPR) soles. Heel 2.5 cm.
Shorts in sweatshirt fabric with an elasticated drawstring waist, side pockets, one back pocket and raw-edge hems.
Jacket in soft faux shearling with a stand-up collar, yoke at the back and zip down the front. Dropped shoulders, diagonal jetted chest pockets, discreet pockets in the side seams and a trimmed hem.
STUDIO COLLECTION. Long top in airy wool jersey with extra-long sleeves and a rounded hem with slits in the sides.
Shorts in a stretch nylon weave with an elasticated drawstring waist and patch front pockets.
Yoga tights in fast-drying functional fabric with a wide waistband to hold in and shape the waist. Key pocket in the waistband.
Straight-cut jacket in woven fabric with a slight sheen. Notch lapels, buttons at the front, flap welt front pockets, a welt chest pocket, and buttons at the cuffs. Lined.
Skater skirt in a soft, fine knit with an elasticated waist.
Snap-on bracelet with a soft toy in faux fur. The bracelet has a soft toy head with embroidered details and appliqués. Size 3.5x20 cm.
Baby Exclusive. Cardigan in soft, slub-knit cotton with buttons down the front and a ribbed trim around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Low-waisted trousers in soft, fine-knit cashmere with covered elastication at the waist and straight, wide legs.
Fancy dress cape in glittery, stretch jersey with a concealed hook and loop fastening at the top and a hood with embroidery and appliqués.
Soft jersey vest tops.
Fine-knit trainer socks in a soft cotton blend with elasticated tops.
Short, wide top in printed sweatshirt fabric with a lined, pointed hood and decorative buttons at the front. Soft, brushed inside.
Sleeveless dress in printed cotton jersey with a gathered seam at the waist and flared skirt.
Narrow Alice bands in shimmering plastic with cat ears on top.
Tops in soft jersey with narrow shoulder straps, a picot trim at the top and decorative bow at the front.
Smocked blouse in soft imitation leather with a frill trim at the top and hem. Short puff sleeves with elastication and a frill trim. Unlined.
T-shirts in soft, organic cotton jersey with a narrow trim around the neckline and a rounded hem. Longer at the back.
Straight-cut, double-breasted jacket in a textured weave with notch lapels, flap front pockets and decorative buttons at the cuffs. Lined.
Sports bra in fast-drying functional fabric with a lined front, racer back with sections in ventilating mesh and a wide elastic hem. Medium support.

Suit trousers in a cotton weave with stretch. Concealed hook-and-eye fastener, a zip fly, side pockets, jetted back pockets and legs with creases. Skinny fit – a fit with slightly shorter legs that is close-fitting at the thighs, knees and ankles to create a completely fitted silhouette.
Chino shorts in stretch cotton twill. Regular, elasticated waist with a concealed drawstring, zip fly and button, diagonal side pockets and jetted back pockets.
Soft cotton twill trousers in a relaxed fit. High, frill-trimmed paper bag waist with covered elastication, a zip fly and press-studs, side and back pockets, and tapered legs.
Blouse in satin with a V-neck, collar, buttons down the front and long, cuffed sleeves.
Calf-length skirt in patterned mesh. High waist with covered elastication, and a seam at the hem with a bead-embroidered flounce. Jersey lining.
Long-sleeved top in printed cotton jersey with a rounded hem. Slightly longer at the back.
Short, A-line skirt with a high waist and buttons down the front.
